scripts.build: docker build --build-arg ACF_PRO_KEY=$(gcloud secrets versions access --secret="acf_pro_key" latest) -t $npm_package_name .
scripts.composer:install: export ACF_PRO_KEY=$(gcloud secrets versions access --secret="acf_pro_key" latest) && composer install
scripts.composer:update: export ACF_PRO_KEY=$(gcloud secrets versions access --secret="acf_pro_key" latest) && composer update
